sys_ux_client_script.name: Countdown

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_4d2e84af47b33550638eaa42736d43bc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3dd49f8f47ffb150638eaa42736d43fa</macroponent><name>Countdown</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const {timing : {setTimeout, setInterval, clearInterval}} = helpers;
    const { setState, state } = api;
    console.log("COUNTDOWN");
    const COUNTDOWN_STEP_INTERVAL_MS = 1000;
    const countdownMessages = [...state.countdownMessages];

//    setState("currentMessage", countdownMessages.shift());
    // Wait an extra second to show the "hi" message before counting down.
    const interval = setInterval(()=> {
        const currentCountdownMessage = countdownMessages.shift();
        if(!currentCountdownMessage) {
            clearInterval(interval);
            console.log("COUNTDOWN COMPLETE");
            helpers.navigate.setRouteParams({params: {question : 1}});
        } else {
            setState("currentCountdownMessage", currentCountdownMessage);
        }
    }, COUNTDOWN_STEP_INTERVAL_MS);

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jon.lind</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 22:19:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>4d2e84af47b33550638eaa42736d43bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Countdown</sys_name><sys_package display_value="QuizNow" source="x_snc_quiznow">2994605e478a7510741c9fe4126d43b7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="QuizNow">2994605e478a7510741c9fe4126d43b7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4d2e84af47b33550638eaa42736d43bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jon.lind</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 22:19:22</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
